items.title: Efforts to reconnect Americans face challenges in a lonely time
items.description: It’s been called an “epidemic” of loneliness and isolation

items.title: Bit by bit, small US groups chip away at historic levels of social isolation
items.description: Americans are disconnected from each other at historic levels, buffeted by what a former surgeon general calls an “epidemic of loneliness.”

items.title: Pulitzer Prize-winning correspondent Peter Arnett has died
items.description: Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist Peter Arnett, who traveled the world covering wars from Vietnam to Iraq, has died

items.title: US announces massive package of arms sales to Taiwan valued at more than $10 billion
items.description: The Trump administration has announced a massive package of arms sales to Taiwan valued at more than $10 billion, including medium-range missiles, how...

items.title: World shares are mixed after AI worries drag Wall Street tech stocks lower
items.description: World shares are mixed after declines for AI stocks dragged the U.S. market to its worst day in nearly a month
